REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2217 reute r f BC-SOUTHERN-<SO>-UNIT-PR 06-02 0083

TEXT.TITLE: SOUTHERN <SO> UNIT PREFERRED OFFERING UNDERWAY
TEXT.BODY: Lead underwriter PaineWebber Group Inc <PWJ> said an offering of two mln shares of the Class A preferred stock of Southern Co's Georgia Power Co subsidiary is underway at 25 dlrs per share. It said the underwriters won the issue at competitive sale today on a bid of 23.812 dlrs per share. The shares are not redeemable through refunding operations before June 1, 1992, when a sinking fund will start retiring the issue. Reuter
